description: Try our easy to follow Pancetta, Spinach & Bread Strata recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Pancetta, Spinach & Bread Strata Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: sour cream (and snipped chives, to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180oC. Grease a cake tin with half the oil and line with baking paper.
Heat the remaining oil in a small pan. Add the pancetta and cinnamon and cook until crisp, about two minutes.
Whisk together the milk, eggs and mustard, and season with salt and pepper.
Add the torn bread rolls to the bottom of the cake tin, top with spinach and pancetta and pour over egg mixture.
Top with cheese and leave to soak for five minutes before baking in the oven for 25 minutes or until cheese is browned. Serve with sour cream and chives.
